tool_description:
Send real physical postcards using our partner API. 
A print on demand service.
name: Postcards By Stannp
title: Postcards By Stannp

api_list.name: Get Balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paaaaaaaaaa-postcards.p.rapidapi.com/balance/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paaaaaaaaaa-postcards.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
